table.0: Battle rage makes friend and foe indistinguishable. Foe is hit for +2d8 damage, and the ally nearest him is also hit by a rebounding blow for 1d4 damage.
table.1: Herculean blow. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike.
table.2: Ferocious strike leaves foe’s weapon hand dangling from the stump of a wrist. Inflict +1d12 damage with this strike.
table.3: Strike sweeps foe to the ground. Inflict +1d12 damage with this strike and make another attack on prone enemy.
table.4: Hammering blow drives nose cartilage into brain. Inflict +1d12 damage with this strike, and the foe suffers 1d6 Int loss.
table.5: Foe’s weapon shattered. If the foe has no weapon, inflict +2d12 damage with this strike.
table.6: Strike shatters foe’s breastbone. The foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or fall unconscious as his internal organs collapse.
table.7: Foe driven back by furious assault. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike, and the foe forgoes his next attack.
table.8: Concussive strike leaves foe dazed. Inflict +1d8 damage with this strike and make a second attack.
table.9: Blow to throat carries through to spinal column, reducing everything in between to pasty mush. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike, and the foe loses speech for 1d4 weeks.
table.10: Blow craters temple. The foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or be blinded by pain and blood for 1d4 rounds.
table.11: Strike reduces face to a formless mass of flesh and bone fragments. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike, and the foe has trouble making hard consonants.
table.12: You see red! Inflict +1d12 damage with this strike as you are overcome by battle rage.
table.13: Hammering strike to torso crushes lesser organs into paste. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike.
table.14: Blow to spinal column numbs lower limbs. The foe suffers a -4 penalty to AC as he learns to walk again.
table.15: Fearsome strike drives enemy to the blood-splattered floor. Foe cowers in fear, prone, for 1d4 rounds.
table.16: Blow shatters shield. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike. If the foe has no shield, he is stunned by pain for 1d4 rounds.
table.17: Foe’s kneecap explodes into red mist. Foe’s movement drops to 0’, and you make another attack.
table.18: Frontal lobotomy. Inflict +1d12 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or suffer amnesia. The foe is stunned for 1d4 rounds, regardless.
table.19: Strike to weapon arm. Foe takes triple damage from his own weapon as it is hammered into his face. Foe drops weapon in dumbfounded awe.
table.20: Blow crushes spinal cord. Inflict +3d12 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or suffer permanent paralysis.
table.21: Blow reduces internal organs to jelly. Death is inevitable in 1d8 rounds.
table.22: Target is disemboweled, spilling his entrails onto the ground. The foe dies of shock in 1d6 rounds.
table.23: Strike to chest explodes heart. Inflict +3d12 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or die instantly.
table.24+: Skull crushed like a melon. Inflict +3d12 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 20 + PC level) or die in 1d3 rounds.
